resources.string: Requires start in background permission for continue
An update has just been downloaded.
You must setup PIN for transfer
Can not recognize the QR code
ERROR %1$d: The group chat is full.
ERROR %1$d: PIN incorrect. You still have %2$d chances. Please wait for 24 hours to retry later.
ERROR %1$d: The amount is too small
Can\'t find an app able to open this media.
You have tried more than 5 times, please wait at least 24 hours to try again.
ERROR %1$d: Phone is used by someone else.
ERROR %1$d: Blockchain not in sync, please try again later.
ERROR %1$d: The request data has invalid field
ERROR %1$d: Please update Mixin to continue use the service.
ERROR %1$d: Send verification code too frequent, please try again later.
ERROR %1$d: The number has reached the limit.
Not supported audio format, please open by other app.
Detected a Mixin QR code, tap to recognize
Use the built-in Camera to scan any QR Code. When a code is detected, tap the notification to view more information.
Once deleted, all this chat messages will be cleared
Search Mixin ID or Phone number: %1$s
We will never display your mobile number publicly.
Enter the 4-digit code send to you at %1$s
The code you\'re entered is incorrect.
We will send a 4-digit code to your phone number %1$s, please enter the code in next screen.
Tap \"Agree & Continue\" to accept the %1$s and %2$s
Create a group chat with up to friends
Add people by Mixin ID or phone number
Scan a friend\'s Mixin QR code
Mixin needs access your contacts to help you connect with other people on Mixin.
Scan the QR code to add me on Mixin
Scan the QR Code to pay me
If you want to share apps, please add it as contact first.
Do you want to change your phone number?
Messages to this conversation are encrypted end-to-end, tap for more info.
Waiting for %1$s to get online and establish an encrypted session. %2$s.
Hold to record, release to send
You cannot place a Mixin call if you\'re already on another call.
Can\'t record voice messages during a Mixin call.
You cannot play audio if your\'re already on play another audio.
Are you sure you want to stop recording and discard your voice message ?
Messages you selected will be deleted for everyone on the latest version of Mixin in this chat.
The link is not in the corresponding resource patterns.
Do you want to report and block this contact? your chat with this conversation will also be deleted.
Hey, I\'m using Mixin Messenger to chat. Download it here: https://mixin.one/messenger .
Please set a new 6 digit PIN.
Please confirm the 6 digit PIN and remember it. If lost, there is no way to recover your wallet.
Please confirm your 6 digit PIN again. It\'s rare to see a third confirmation somewhere else, so please remember the PIN is unrecoverable if lost.
Yes, there is a fourth PIN confirmation, and I promise it\'s the last one to ensure you have remembered your PIN. The PIN is unrecoverable if lost.
The PIN is too simple and insecure.
Are you sure you want to transfer %3$s worth %2$s to %1$s ？
The PIN did not match the re-typed PIN, please try again.
Please enter the 6 digit PIN to verify.
You\'ll be asked for it periodically to help you remember it.
Please enter PIN to open Biometrics
Please enter PIN to Modify Pay with PIN interval
For the security of your assets, you need to verify your PIN for the specified interval.
Use your device pattern to continue
Invalid biometrics state, please reset in wallet setting.
Copy to clipboard. Warning: this is NOT the deposit address.
You\'re no longer a participant in this group
You can\'t send messages to this group because you\'re no longer a participant.
You can chat with contacts who have\nMixin install on their phone
Change who can add you to conversation and groups.
Blocked users can\'t send you messages or add you to groups.
You can restrict who can send message to me.
You can restrict who can add me to group chats.
The emergency contact is designed to help you log in to your account if you are lost and can not retrieve your mobile number.
Attention: the Emergency Contact cannot help you to recover PIN
When your lost your mobile number, please contact your emergency contact by phone or other means to get the Mixin ID and verification code. Read our Emergency Contact to learn more.
Enter your emergency contact Mixin ID
Enter the 4-digit code send to Mixin ID: %1$s
Confirm to set Mixin ID %1$s as your emergency contact? Please note that the other party must add you as a contact to set up successfully.
Do you want to change your mobile number now?
Your emergency contact is protected by PIN
Voice messages are always auto-downloaded for the best communication experience
You have signed onto your desktop
Mixin syncs your address book to Mixin servers to help you connect with other Mixin users.
This will remove your contacts from the Mixin servers.
Show notifications when receiving a transfer greater than or equal to %1$s.
Show confirmation dialog when transfer greater than or equal to %1$s
%1$s joined the group via invite link
Unknown type of Message, please upgrade the APP
Anyone with Mixin can follow this link to join this group. Only share it with people you trust.
System time is unusual, please continue to use again after correction
The database is being upgraded, please do not close this App.
The sender is not in your contacts
Click the button to interact with the bot
Don\'t miss message from your friends.
allow bot to send messages represent of you
This payment link has already been paid by someone, you can not make a duplicate payment.
A transaction fee of %1$s is required for withdrawing %2$s
A transaction fee of %1$s is required for withdrawing %2$s. %3$s has a minimum %4$s %5$s reserve requirement.
Destination Tag or ID Number or notes. If not, you can set it No Memo.
If you are required to fill in Destination Tag or ID Number or notes, you can Add Memo.
Destination Tag or ID Number or notes. If not, you can set it No Tag.
If you are required to fill in Destination Tag or ID Number or notes, you can Add Tag.
Attention: Please try a small amount for the first deposit. Both a Memo and an Address are required to successfully deposit your %1$s to Mixin Messenger.
Please try a small amount for the first deposit.
Deposit will arrive after at least %1$d block confirmations
For the first withdraw to the new address, please try a small amount.
This address supports all base on EOS tokens, such as EOS, IQ, BLACK, OCT, KARMA, etc.
This address supports all ERC-20 tokens, such as ETH, XIN, TUSD, HT, LOOM, DGD, LEO, etc.
This address only supports BTC and Omni USDT.
This address supports TRX and all TRC-10 tokens, such as TRX, BTT, etc.
Requires stickers file size larger than 1KB and less than 800KB, width and height between 64px and 512px.
Restore your messages from external storage.\nIf you don\'t restore new, you won\'t be able to restore later.

Back up your messages and media to external storage. You can restore them when you reinstall Mixin. Your messages and media will also back up to your phone\'s internal storage. Media and messages your back up are not protected by Mixin end-to-end encryption while in external storage.
Back up your messages to external storage. You can restore them when you reinstall Mixin. Messages you back up are not protected while in external storage.
Auto back up to external storage
There are no available memory for backup.
Mixin needs access to draw above other apps to play videos in Picture-in-Picture mode.
This multisig link has already been signed by yourself, you can not make a duplicate operation.
This multisig link has already been unlocked by someone, you can not make a duplicate operation.
Please upgrade Mixin Messenger Desktop to the latest version.
